languageSelection.title: Choose your language
languageSelection.subtitle: Select one language to begin the STOP-BANG quiz.

intro.description: Answer 8 short questions to estimate your risk for sleep apnea.

instructions.1: This quiz is not a diagnosis.
instructions.2: Please answer honestly for better guidance.
instructions.3: High-risk results require a consent step before data collection.

2.text: Do you often feel tired during daytime?

3.text: Has anyone observed you stop breathing during sleep?

4.text: Do you have high blood pressure?

7.text: Is your neck circumference greater than 40 cm?

low.label: Low Risk
low.description: Your answers suggest low risk. Keep healthy sleep habits and monitor symptoms.

moderate.label: Moderate Risk
moderate.description: Your answers suggest moderate risk. Consider discussing this with a healthcare professional.

high.label: High Risk
high.description: Your answers suggest high risk. Please review consent details for follow-up data collection.

consent.title: Consent for Follow-up
consent.description: Because your result indicates high risk, we request consent to collect your follow-up contact data.
consent.privacy: Your data will be used only for care coordination and handled according to our privacy policy.
consent.checkbox: I understand the privacy explanation and agree to provide my data.

completion.title: Thank You
completion.message: Your quiz flow is complete. Please seek clinical advice if symptoms continue.

errors.consentRequired: You must check the consent box to continue.
